post.text: Join me behind the scenes at the 2016 GOP Convention -- as I introduce our next First Lady of the United States of America, Melania Trump! #MakeAmericaSafeAgain

comment.author: Christopher
comment.text: OMG!!! Melania Trump's 'presumptive first lady' speech tonite plagiarized from Michelle Obama's speech! Only in Trump world....

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: No drugs for me...how was the Kool-Aid?
